Nibble Apps | Android Developer | Part-time | Remote

Our small, fully remote team is behind some of the best selling food and drink apps in the App Store. We've been featured by Apple, Google and we've received an Apple App of the Year award. We're hiring an Android developer to help us build out our much loved FitMenCook Android app, as well as helping us create new cooking experiences for Alexa and Google Home.

FitMenCook Android: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.nibbleapps...

Experience with Google Firebase preferable. You can reach me at andreas@nibbleapps.com
